ot: You're all clear, $(kid). Now let's blow this thing and go home!
You may $(fire) when ready
Stabilize your rear deflectors. Watch for enemy fighters
Use the Force, Luke! Let go, Luke!
Everything is proceeding as I had foreseen
Everything that has transpired has done so according to my design
$(Rise), my friend
Now witness the firepower of this fully armed and operational $(battlestation)!
Good! Use your aggressive feelings, boy, let the hate flow through you!
It's a trap!
We have no choice, general Calrissian! Our ships cannot repel the firepower of that magnitude!
We shall double our $(efforts)
It's an older $(code), sir, but it checks out
Well, of course I know him. He's me
Only $(Imperial stormtroopers) are so precise
I suggest you try it again, $(Luke). This time, let go of your conscious self and act on instinct
Impressive. Most impressive
You have $(learned) much, young one
The Force is with you, young Skywalker, but you are not a Jedi yet
I find your lack of $(faith) disturbing
He is as clumsy as he is stupid
The Force is strong with this one
That's it! The $(rebels) are there!
Perhaps you think you're being treated unfairly?
I'm altering the deal. Pray I don't alter it any further
Move the ship out of the asteroid field, so we can send a clear transmission
Don't be too proud of this technological terror you've constructed
The ability to destroy a $(planet) is insignificant next to the power of the Force
Evacuate? In our moment of triumph?
You'll find I'm full of surprises
I warn you not to underestimate my $(powers)
CONCENTRAAATE!
When 900 years old you are, $(look) as good you will not
Always with you it cannot be done
My own counsel will I keep on who is to be trained
Do, or do not. There is no try
Judge me by my size, do you?
Don't underestimate the powers of the $(emperor)
There's no mystical energy field controls my destiny
It's all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense
Never tell me the odds!
That wasn't a laser blast, something hit us
It's the ship that made the $(Kessel) run in less than 12 parsecs
Traveling through $(hyperspace) ain't like dustin' crops, boy
We're losing a deflector shield
You said you wanted to be around when I made a mistake. This could be it
Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?
Help me, $(Obi-Wan Kenobi), you're my only hope
I recognized your foul stench when I was brought on board
There is a great disturbance in the Force
You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villany
The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded
prequels: — My Lord, is that legal? — I will make it legal
Ah, victory
You will find $(controlling her) will not be difficult
The ability to $(speak) does not make you intelligent
There's always a bigger fish
A communications disruption could mean only one thing - invasion
A surprise, to be sure, but a welcome one
May the Force be with you
I'll try $(spinning), that's a good trick
$(Jar Jar), usen da booma!
Now this is $(Podracing)!
We will watch your career with great interest
Confer on you the level of Jedi Knight the council does
Mmm. Always two there are. No more, no less
This is getting out of hand. Now there are two of them!
The dark side clouds everything. Impossible to see the future is
Truly wonderful the mind of a $(child) is
She can't do that! Shoot her! Or something!
200,000 $(units) are ready, with a million more well on the way
As you see, my $(Jedi) powers are far beyond yours. Now, back down
Surely you can do better!
Much to learn you still have
Good. Twice the pride, double the fall
Dew it!
Not to worry, we are still flying half a ship
Is it possible to learn this $(power)?
Hello there
You are a bold one
If one is to understand a great mystery, one must study all its aspects
So uncivilized
It's treason, then
In the name of the Galactic Senate of the Republic, you're under arrest
I am the Senate
To cheat $(death) is a power only one has achieved
The Force is strong with you. A powerful Sith you will become
Only a Sith deals in absolutes
Your arrogance blinds you, $(Master Yoda)
Not if anything to say about it I have
At an end your $(rule) is, and not short enough it was
I sense $(Lord Vader) is in danger
— It's $(out of our range). — Not for a Sith
If this body is not capable of action, I suggest $(new leadership) is needed
